sentences.en: At the heart of the problem lies an outmoded central banking strategy.
sentences.cn: 问题的核心在于过时的央行战略.

sentences.en: Forget about shared folders -- that is an outmoded paradigm.
sentences.cn: 忘掉共享文件夹吧,那过时了.

sentences.en: His political philosophy tends to be written of as an outmoded fantasy.
sentences.cn: 他的政治哲学往往被看作是过时的幻想而被认为一文不值.

sentences.en: His political philosophy tends to be written off as an outmoded fantasy.
sentences.cn: 他的政治观点往往被认为是不合时宜的.

sentences.en: I predict it will outmoded overnight.
sentences.cn: 我预测它会一下子就过时的.

sentences.en: Modern ways of cooking have outmoded the hearth.
sentences.cn: 现低的烹饪方式已经使这种生活方式过时了.

sentences.en: Out of style or use; outmoded.
sentences.cn: 过时的过时的或废弃不用的; ''.'老式'.''的.

sentences.en: Quite fRankly, I fiind this to be an outmoded concept.
sentences.cn: 坦白讲, 我认为这个观点已经过时了.

sentences.en: Romania badly needs aid to modernise its outmoded industries.
sentences.cn: 罗马尼亚亟需援助以使其落后的工业现代化。

sentences.en: Technologies change rapidly. Today's cutting edge may be tomorrow's outmoded design.
sentences.cn: 科技变化快速. 今天的尖端技术明天可能就成了过时的设计.

sentences.en: The political system has become thoroughly outmoded.
sentences.cn: 这一政治体制已经完全落伍了。

sentences.en: This is absurd, outmoded and based on a primitive understanding of human behavior.
sentences.cn: 这是荒唐的, 过时的,基于对于原始的人类行为而产生的理论.

sentences.en: To my thinking they will be outmoded in four years.
sentences.cn: 据我看来,四年之后这些就会过时.

sentences.en: Water transportation was outmoded by railroads and good pikes.
sentences.cn: 水上运输已因铁路和良好的税道而变得过时了.

sentences.en: Whole areas of libraries fade from use as they become outdated or outmoded.
sentences.cn: 随着图书资料的逐渐陈旧过时,整个图书馆的用处开始退化.

trans.tran_cn: 使过时( outmode的过去式和过去分词 )
